caption.p: Influence of climatic changes on health and diseases

tr.th: How climatic changes influence health and diseases:

td.p: - Diseases caused by consumption of rotted food
- Diseases due to consumption of contaminated water (e.g. cholera, hepatitis A, giardiasis and cryptosporidiosis)
-Spore-borne diseases (washed away via floods e.g. anthrax).

tr.td: - In human (e.g. wind pox) and animals (e.g. FMD).

td.p: - Including bacterial, viral and parasitic diseases as West Nile fever

tr.td: - The spread of rats and mice which has health and economic impacts

td.p: - Physical diseases (e.g. sun struck, respirator asthma and heart diseases)
- Psychological diseases and stress borne diseases

tr.td: Because of wars and famines which spread diseases in addition to its economic impacts
Due to water and food scanty which spread diseases to new areas
